thread.title: Mike Leach says Washington State has 'best football facilities in the conference -- better than Oregon'
thread.title_full: Mike Leach says Washington State has 'best football facilities in the conference -- better than Oregon' | OregonLive.com

author: John Canzano | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Mike Leach says Washington State has 'best football facilities in the conference -- better than Oregon'
text:
The always interesting, always entertaining Washington State coach Mike Leach dropped by the Bald Faced Truth radio show (M-F, 12--3p on 750-AM/102.9-FM) and ignited a debate on conference facilities.
"We have the best facilities in the conference -- better than Oregon," said Leach.
He also talked about Sharon Stone, guns, spears, axes, pizza and why Donald Trump has created a three-party race for the presidency.
I circled back at the end of the interview and asked Leach if he wanted to stand by his original comment about the facilities given that some Ducks fans on Twitter were already taking issue with it. Oregon completed a $68 million, 145,000-square foot facility in 2013.
Said Leach, "I know, it drives them nuts."
He pointed out that each of the floors on the football facility has 15,000-square feet, and that it sits squarely "in the heart of our campus."
Listen to the full interview here:
